page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: EDUCATION - CHRONOLOGY OF GROWTH l732 Countess Anne's Charity School founded for girls l760- Boarding school for lst Marquis of Salisbury l8l2-l9 School at Vicarage l838 Puttocks Oak School founded l838 Northcotts Boarding School l839 Writing School at Fore Street l839 National School in Fore Street l846 A Girl's School at Rectory Drive l850 London Road National School began l85l Day School at Fore Street l85l Boarding School opened in Fore Street l854 National School at Puttocks Oak l854 Free School opened in Park Street l905 St. Audreys Senior boys C of E School l9l2 Countess Anne's Charity School closed l9l3 C of E Infants School opened
